text: Emma Jayne Atkins (born 31 March 1975) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Charity Dingle in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2000–2005, 2009–present). ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English radio actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Emma Atkins
